definition.name: uptodate-action
definition.description: Check that repository assets are up to date
definition.author: Vanessa Sochat

inputs.name: root
inputs.description: Root path to provide to command. Can be a Dockerfile or directory.

inputs.name: parser
inputs.description: Parser to run, one of dockerfile, or dockerhierarchy

inputs.name: dry_run
inputs.description: Do a dry run (don't write, but show changes) one of true or false, defaults to false

inputs.name: changes
inputs.description: Only consider relevant changed files for the current git commit

inputs.name: flags
inputs.description: Extra flags for the parser (e.g., --no-build-args or --no-empty-build-args for dockerfilelist)

outputs.name: dockerfile_matrix
outputs.description: A matrix of Dockerfile changes with name and filename set to the Dockerfile name

outputs.name: dockerhierarchy_matrix
outputs.description: A matrix of new Dockerfiles and the corresponding tag (Name)

outputs.name: dockerfilelist_matrix
outputs.description: A matrix of Dockerfiles listed with dockerfilelist

evidence.reasoning: The action checks if repository assets are up to date, which relates to managing dependencies and ensuring code quality. It also involves testing the current state against expected updates.
